DESCRIPTION: Transforms 一张牌 in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run. The new card deals #b1 more damage 并获得s #b1 more #y格挡 for the rest of combat. This effect stacks。
When 一张牌 is #yTransmuted, any #yMutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of combat。
